storyInfo: The party has to convince the representatives of the city to go along with Stitch's plan, and Inam goes to talk things out with the business representative. Gavial discovers that Avdotya, a Zeruertza local who once came from the surface, is extremely wary of them.

attributes.content: So, if we want to blow up the slide and rebuild the railway, we'll have to convince the business representative, Croque Diamondface; the industry representative, Deculture Silvermint; as well as that Catch guy?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes, they hold the most prominent positions, and most Durins will cast their votes depending on their movements.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: And why can't you do this yourself?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I see, you must not be very popular around here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Would it kill you to sugar-coat it a little bit?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Seems like a major pain in the tail. But whatever, I'll treat it like a good deed for Acahualla.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So where can I find them?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Phew, it's finally over. That Gavial is pretty scary.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Seems like you're on the right path though, finally.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Are you happy now, Edge?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: To be honest, I'm not sure I'm ready to part with the Great Aquapit.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Hah! Whose fault is it that the damned thing's sitting in the middle of the railway? Otherwise I really wouldn't have been able to find a single person willing to knock that thing down!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Yeah, but I did just have an idea. It's been more than half a year since the dome broke and the waterfall started coming down.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Everyone's been having a great time, but I'm sure they're starting to get tired of it.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Why don't we take this opportunity to build something brand new? I think you were talking to Catch about a super water cannon or something, and it's on everyone's lips now!
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: And I'm not gonna lie, I'm also a little intrigued...
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That Archosauria woman! Brutish, uncouth, impetuous, and presumptuous! Can you believe it, Croque? I was having a bit of writer's block, so I went up to the caves to harvest some wild tea and relax...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: And someone scooped you up and jumped off the top of the waterfall.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Utterly unthinkable.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Regrettably, I'm afraid that no ordinary Zeruertzan would be able to resist the seduction of that story. If it were put to paper, it would become an overnight sensation.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: 'You can trust me.' 'Avdotya, hold on tight.' Ahh, it hits all those passionate notes.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Forget it!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: It certainly beats your umpteenth story about the snow.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Speaking of which, a couple days ago, a few kids came by to talk to me about those short stories. I thought I was finally getting some readers...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: What'd they have to say?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: 'Really funny. I want to see what happens next.'
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I knew it.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Avdotya, they didn't mean any harm. It's just that we Durins have no way of relating to your experiences.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: How long did it take for me to finally understand a sliver of your background? Let's not even talk about ordinary Durins.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: None of us have seen real snow, let alone the kind that you describe... How do you pronounce those words again? 'Chiaroscuro'? 'Ephemeral'?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: It'd be better if those words only existed in literature.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Regardless, I'm happy with my life now. I don't try to control anyone, nobody tries to control me. There are no terror plots brewing behind the scenes, no risk of getting framed, no getting dragged into an assassination.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I write a few ads and design a few signs for our shopping district, and that's enough to keep me fed. What more could I ask for?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I spend my days bathing beneath the sun on my recliner. Sure, it might be an artificial light source, but that's enough for me.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I was hoping these tranquil days would continue forever, until...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Is this the office of the business representative, Croque Diamondface?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hello, I want to blow up that big slide.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Yo, Avdotya, fancy seeing you here!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: She doesn't look too good.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Sorry, Croque, I'm afraid I have to excuse myself.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I need to head back and perform some maintenance on my crossbow.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Did I do something to make her mad?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ahem... Are you the guests who just arrived in Zeruertza? I heard Catch talking about you earlier.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I must say, his assessment of the situation was on the nose.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: 'A merry bunch more Durin than Durins.'
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Evasive maneuvers! Evasive maneuvers!
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Hmm, what a weird design. Couldn't be more different from Lancet-2.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Please stay back!
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Doesn't seem as smart as her, but it does share some of her same basic reactions. Wonder how this thing works?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Danger level: high! Stay back, stranger.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Take it easy, little fella. My name's Zumama. I'm not going to hurt you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Defining identity, Zumama.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Attributes: Model R3-E3 assistant robot, number 0429, for the glory of serving the Durin people.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Hi there, 0429. Is there something wrong with your shock absorber system? You're wobbling all over the place.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Self-inspection report: End of service life: approaching. Original components: aging.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: I can help. Look, I have a whole set of maintenance tools.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Overhaul... Determining probability of success: low. R3-E3 will be scrapped after service life ends.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: From what I've seen, little fella, there's nothing major wrong with you. Probably nothing a few screws can't fix, so don't give up on yourself just yet.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You're a cutie, so I'd like to help you. How about it?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: We can be friends.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Friends? Unable to comprehend: friend.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: You can help me conduct an overhaul?
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Sure can.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But I'll have to open up your shell first.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: No. Requesting mission cancellation, requesting mission cancellation. Danger, danger!
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Don't run away! It'll be fine!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Did I just see a surface-dweller Phidia chasing after an assistant robot?
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: Well that's odd. Did I drink too much yesterday?
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: Speaking of which, Avdotya writes about this kind of stuff, doesn't she? About 'chasing and killing' and whatnot, even if I can't understand half of it.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: Well, uh, I guess I'm starting to get why she keeps saying it's not meant to be a comedy.
attributes.name: Durin Passerby

attributes.content: Care for some tea, Miss Inam?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: So, Durins actually do have non-alcoholic drinks.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Everyone needs a change of pace every now and then. Plus, ahem, I AM still at work, after all. I prefer to drink on my own time.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: You suggested we talk one-on-one.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I have no doubts about Gavial's skills in a fight, but I don't think her fists will be very helpful here.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: After all, we're not so different. You, the business representative of Zeruertza, and I.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I see that you're the type to talk trade. Fine by me, I'm on board.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Zeruertza is just a small Durin settlement. A few years ago, when we were still connected to the other cities, I did have a semblance of a job as the business representative.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: But ever since the last earthquake, our sole railroad has been cut off. Zeruertza is fortunate enough to be self-sufficient, the citizens aren't the neediest and there's been little urgency to restore our ties with the outside.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Nowadays, my job is little more than catering to the whims of Zeruertza's populace and pushing out a few entertainment activities.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Throw my weight around with the hawkers near the Great Aquapit, advertise some self-driving cart parts. It's a leisurely life.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I don't know much about Durin philosophy, but does 'not being the neediest' normally mean getting piss drunk and going surfing?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Pretty much.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: But if you asked anyone up on the surface...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Pretty much. By our standards, that's not very needy.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: So, it doesn't matter what terms Stitch laid out for you. If you want me to go along with your plan to blow up the water slide, you'll have to come up with something that'll impress me.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: No business gets done until both sides find the deal amenable.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: What can you offer Zeruertza's economy? Acahuallan artifacts aren't enough.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I heard some sharp self-driving cart dealers already used your grand entrance to generate some excitement for their wares, but that's not enough either.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: You... understand the way we do things on the surface better than I expected.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Though I haven't been up there surface myself, the library we have here in the city isn't just for show.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I am familiar with your customs.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: The Acahuallans dance around a Metal Crab without sleep or rest, and the last one standing becomes the Great Chief. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Where did you hear that?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I read it in 'Stranger Things.' It's the most popular periodical in Zeruertza. Back in the day, a great adventurer brought a whole big set down from the surface. It's basically our encyclopedia of the surface world.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: That's just a lousy tabloid!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Surely you're mistaken... You have no idea how diligently I studied Sargonian to be able to read those books.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: No wonder your accent sounds almost native.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Welp, there goes my motivation all of a sudden. I feel like I could probably just bribe you with the last few issues of 'Stranger Things.'
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: The most recent ones? There are sequels to those books?! Hmm... If you really could procure those, then maybe I could consider it...
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I can hook you up with some good stuff.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: What is this?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: A videotape. Want to take a look?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Found you.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, Avdotya, what a coincidence. Are you here to enjoy the scenery again?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Be frank with me — why did you people come here?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Miss Inam said she'd handle the discussions with Miss Croque, so the rest of us came out here to find Zumama.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: That's not what I mean. Why did you surface people come down into our city? What's your real purpose?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I've been guarding the Super Convenient Lift-o-Matic #1 for a long time. Where's the main battalion backing you? Have Sargon's lords ameer finally taken an interest in the wealth underground?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: This city doesn't have the loot you want. Leave, unless you want to poison this peaceful little city with bloodshed.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I told you, this is a misunderstanding. Stitch was trying to find someone to help him repair the railway, and tricked us into coming here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You mean you're his slave labor? And you're okay with that?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That guy was acting like the sky was falling at the time, and Tomimi added her own creative touch... *sigh*, I was worried half to death, Zumama was up all night prepping for a tough fight, and we rushed over as fast as we could.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: *sniffle*... Sorry, I just wanted Gavial to take some time off...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Well, it worked out... I guess I'll take this opportunity for a little vacation.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So... You people really don't have any ill intent? You weren't ordered by some noble to ransack the town?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Believe me or not. Your call.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You do have a point... Even Sargon wouldn't ask someone as rude as you to serve them.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Rude? I just don't like wasting my breath.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: My plan's simple and straightforward. Help out that little runt Stitch, pick up some useful tech for us Tiacauh, and then go home. That's all.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: There's still a bunch of patients back at Rhodes Island waiting for me to check on 'em.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're telling me you're a doctor?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: What, do I not look the part? I'm licensed and everything.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: If Miss Tomimi here said that she was a doctor, I'd be half-inclined to believe her for a few seconds.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, I can be a doctor too! Gavial taught me anesthesia!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Find the right spot, and then give it a good whack––
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Everyone at Rhodes Island calls it, uh, 'Gaviallic kinetic anesthesia.'
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: For crying out loud, it's a non-conventional modality. Even I rarely use it outside of extremely special circumstances.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: For example, when you've just run out of anesthesia and you lost your supply bag because you were beating the bad guys with it, stuff like that.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ––I think I'll keep an eye on you people after all.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Don't get any funny ideas. Zeruertza is my haven of peace, and I won't let you destroy it.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Go nuts.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I'll make sure you leave Zeruertza after doing what you said you're here to do.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Well, until then, why don't we check out the shops?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Um, Miss Avdotya... You're from these parts, so would you mind showing us around Zeruertza?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Just a word of warning... If your plan is to case the city and map it, you'd give up on that.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: N-No, that's not it! What I mean is...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I absolutely love your outfit! Are there any Durin fashion outlets worth visiting? I... really want to go take a look!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Alright, if that's what you want... There are a few places worth going to.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Are you interested in seeing some Durin jewelry?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I am!!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Stitch––
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: What are you doing here, Catch?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You used to always lock yourself in your room. What's the occasion?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Look, even I want to catch some rays every now and then. Surely you didn't come all the way out here just to say that?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You're trying to blow up my slide, and you're not even going to let me talk to you?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: ...Hmph. So you know.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Master Edge told me.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: That decrepit old... Are you here to get a confession out of me?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Actually, I'm not opposed to it. This summer has gone on far too long.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: And as architects, our best work is always the next project, right?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Gah. I hate that part of you more than anything else.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Which?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You don't have a single serious bone in your body.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Hahaha, I'll take that as the highest compliment!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I'll agree to whatever you want with the slide, on the condition that we talk about the dome.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: What's there to talk about?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Let's go take a walk. You should experience the Great Aquapit for yourself before deciding whether to blow it up, no?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Do you have more? Where can I get the next one?!
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Pwaaah! That's the good stuff! Inam, want me to pour you some more?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I still haven't finished mine...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: C'mon, hurry it up~
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: It's a shame Team Red Wine and Coffee didn't win the championship! Ahh, they were just one step away from that ship!
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: You seem to be enjoying yourself.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I must admit, you surface-dwellers lead slightly more interesting lives than I imagined!
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: What is this a recording of?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: The Dossoles Warrior Championship. It's an old video I got from a friend who runs a caravan.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I heard something happened there not too long ago, and I don't know if the event has been held these last few years.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Ahhhh! I want to see more! I want to see the losers make a comeback next year!
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Croque, even the most boring form of recreation can become quite stimulating if you spice things up with a bit of competition.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: You cheer for the team you support while chugging ale with your friends. I don't think any Durin would be able to turn down this lifestyle.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Plus, alcohol and fast food sales generally double during a competition. How about it? I think it'd fit the Durins like a glove.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Alcohol sells well enough in this city, and I doubt there's any need to hold a competition to stimulate those sales.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: That said, hmm... From the perspective of fun and entertainment, there is a certain appeal.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Let me say this to you straight, business representative.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Want to build a super water racetrack?
attributes.name: Inam
